headline: BILZ AIR PNEUMATIC ISOLATOR 9500 LB CAPACITY
description: Set of four leveling isolators with three electro pneumatic positioners and positioner controller.
keywords: damped tables active isolation passive isolation
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Tables > Vibration Isolation Tables
specstable:
Manufacturer BILZ Vibration Techn
Model BiAir 1 ED
Isolation Active
Operating Air Pressure 87.00 PSI (599,891.10 N/sq m)
Other Information Highly effective vibration insulation of sensitive measuring and testing machines as well as optical and electronic equipment.

9500 lb. capacity at 87 psi

(4) BiAir 1 ED Air Spring Isolators
(3) Electro Pneumatic Positioners (EPN) by Genge & Thoma, CH-2543
(1) EPN Controller NRR-3-PI-24
